name: Made By AI
description:
the game was made by AI like the title suggests here is the link to the bot if you want to to check it out https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt/ . it is a game where you are on a platform and a enemy comes from either your right or left and you have kill them by shooting them but your gun is your only source of movement. 

this is my first game I hope you enjoy.

also by the way this game is pretty buggy lets just say the bugs are features :)
